root.message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 4-4-1, translated into en
root.data:
Activities are classified according to agreement at the Expert Group meeting on ICT Household Indicators (EGH).

Furthermore, for countries that collect this data through an official survey, and if data allow breakdown and disaggregation, the indicator can be broken down by region (urban/rural), by sex, by age group, by educational level (ISCED), by labour force status (ILO), and by occupation (ISCO). ITU collects data for all of these breakdowns from countries.
